FlexiPage.description: Individual Giving Opportunity record page to be assigned to Individual Giving Opportunity

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Information in this tab will be available when you reach the Qualify stage.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Information in this tab will be available when you reach the Cultivation stage.

componentInstanceProperties.name: visibilityByUser
componentInstanceProperties.value: (UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Advancement_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Advancement_Operations_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Fundraiser' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Fundraising_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Donor_Engagement_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Executive_Director_Advancement')

componentInstanceProperties.name: relatedListFilters
componentInstanceProperties.value: (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Cause' OR RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment' OR RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Gift_In_Kind' OR RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pledge')

componentInstanceProperties.name: visibilityByUser
componentInstanceProperties.value: (UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Advancement_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Advancement_Operations_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Fundraiser' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Donor_Engagement_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Executive_Director_Advancement' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Fundraising_Manager')

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Information in this tab will be available when you reach the Solicitation stage.

componentInstanceProperties.name: visibilityByUser
componentInstanceProperties.value: (UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Advancement_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Donor_Engagement_Manager' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Executive_Director_Advancement' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Fundraising_Manager')
